lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The proposed tax is designed to provide the EC with extra cash to finance community oilseed crops at their current levels and to brake a dramatic decrease in olive oil consumption by making it more competitive with other oils.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The European Community's (EC) executive Commission defended attacks on major elements of its ambitious program to rid the EC of its controversial farm surpluses, after strong attacks from northern states.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Britain, normally a keen advocate of radical changes in the EC's costly farm subsidies system, warned the proposal to impose the tax on both domestic and imported oils and fats could seriously damage the EC's trade relations with other countries.

lst.name: sentence
